description: Mentioned only by Irwin in a list of Céleste stops, without any definition. We have not encountered elsewhere the name Echo Viole, though it is most likely a synonym for Echo Viol; we can only assume this stop to be a Céleste composed of softly voiced Viole ranks.
examplesDescription: Echo Viole Céleste, Swell; First Church of Christ, Scientist, Boston, Massachusetts, USA.

examples.name: Echo Viole Céleste, Swell; First Church of Christ, Scientist, Boston, Massachusetts, USA.
